subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: After posting two of the three fastest 800-meter times by a woman in 11 years, Pamela Jelimo is a favorite to win Olympic middle-distance gold next month in Beijing.
snippet: After posting two of the three fastest 800-meter times by a woman in 11 years, Pamela Jelimo is a favorite to win Olympic middle-distance gold next month in Beijing.
